member.name: T:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer
member.summary: Recognizes drag/pinch multi-touch gestures and translates them into pan/zoom information.

member.name: F:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.activeTouches
member.summary: Up to 2 touches being currently tracked in a pan/zoom.

member.name: F:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.startingDistance
member.summary: Distance between touch points when the second touch point begins. Used to determine whether the touch points cross along a given axis during the zoom gesture.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: To add methods that will be invoked upon recognition, you can use the AddTarget method.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.TouchesBegan(Foundation.NSSet,UIKit.UIEvent)
member.summary: Called when a touch gesture begins.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.TouchesMoved(Foundation.NSSet,UIKit.UIEvent)
member.summary: Called when a touch gesture is moving.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.TouchesEnded(Foundation.NSSet,UIKit.UIEvent)
member.summary: Called when a touch gesture ends.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.TouchesCancelled(Foundation.NSSet,UIKit.UIEvent)
member.summary: Called when a touch gesture is cancelled.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.DidDirectionChange(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Determines whether the direction has changed.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.CalculateScaleFactor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the scale factor.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.CalculateStartingDistance
member.summary: Calculates the starting distance.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.PreventCross(OxyPlot.ScreenVector)
member.summary: Applies the "prevent fingers crossing" to the specified vector.
member.returns: A vector where the "prevent fingers crossing" is applied.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.KeepAspectRatioWhenPinching
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this keeps the aspect ratio when pinching.
member.value: true if keep aspect ratio when pinching; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.ZoomThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets how far apart touch points must be on a certain axis to enable scaling that axis. (only applies if KeepAspectRatioWhenPinching is false)

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.AllowPinchPastZero
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a zoom-out gesture can turn into a zoom-in gesture if the fingers cross. If true, and is false, a zoom-out gesture can turn into a zoom-in gesture if the fingers cross. Setting to false will instead simply stop the zoom at that point.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Xamarin.iOS.PanZoomGestureRecognizer.TouchEventArgs
member.summary: Gets or sets the current calculated pan/zoom changes.
